title: A New Chapter In The Codex
summary:
Key ideas
- The author has been working part-time and living off savings for a year
- The author is about to start a full-time job in medicine and psychiatry
- The author will have less time to write complex essays and will be using Twitter for shorter thoughts

Key learnings
- The author will be moving away from his previous blogging style 
- The author will be focusing more on medicine and psychiatry in his work

Key questions
- How often will the author be able to blog once he starts his new job?
- Will the author's writing style change significantly as a result of the new job?
- Can someone help the author with a bitcoin transaction?
